pullrequest.title: Enable word wrap for globals value column

content.raw:
Yes it was definitely a bit of a rabbit hole!  
So actually the new PR seems to work fine with earlier Qt versions \(I can see text wrapping glitches that aren’t present in newer versions, but they are minor\), so if you would like to test, that would be great.  
I will decline this PR for now since I didn’t end up making commits on top of this branch even though I used the same ideas.
content.html:
Yes it was definitely a bit of a rabbit hole!
So actually the new PR seems to work fine with earlier Qt versions (I can see text wrapping glitches that aren’t present in newer versions, but they are minor), so if you would like to test, that would be great.
I will decline this PR for now since I didn’t end up making commits on top of this branch even though I used the same ideas.
